document.full_text: marian hossa scored on a power play 51 seconds into overtime, lifting the chicago blackhawks to a 3-2 win over the detroit red wings on monday night.
document.title: hossa gives blackhawks 3-2 ot win over red wings
lines_and_colors: marian hossa scored on a power play 51 seconds into overtime, lifting the chicago blackhawks to a 3-2 win over the detroit red wings on monday night.
